snippet.title: The Sims & The Sims 2 Legacy Collections - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Play and create across re-releases of The Sims, The Sims 2 and packs, now for Windows 10/11. That’s right – we’re taking it back to where it all began with the launch of The Sims Legacy Collection, The Sims 2 Legacy Collection, and The Sims 25th Birthday Bundle. 

Learn more about these nostalgic re-releases: https://www.ea.com/games/the-sims/news/the-birthday-bundle/ 

The Sims 25th Birthday Bundle contains the content of both The Sims: Legacy Collection and The Sims 2: Legacy Collection.  

The Sims 25th Birthday Bundle is rolling out globally on Windows 10 and 11 beginning on January 31, 2025 on the EA App, Steam, and Epic Games Store: https://ea.com/games/the-sims/the-sims-25th-birthday-bundle/ 


The Sims: Legacy Collection includes The Sims and the following packs: The Sims: Livin’ Large, The Sims: House Party, The Sims: Hot Date, The Sims: Vacation, The Sims: Unleashed, The Sims: Superstar, The Sims: Makin’ Magic, along with The Sims 4: Throwback Fit Kit.

The Sims: Legacy Collection is rolling out globally on Windows 10 and 11 beginning on January 31, 2025 on the EA App, Steam, and Epic Games Store: https://ea.com/games/the-sims/the-sims-25th-anniv-edition/ 


The Sims 2: Legacy Collection includes The Sims 2 and the following packs: The Sims 2: University, The Sims 2: Nightlife, The Sims 2: Open for Business, The Sims 2: Pets, The Sims 2: Bon Voyage, The Sims 2: Seasons, The Sims 2: FreeTime, The Sims 2: Apartment Life, The Sims 2: Holiday Party Pack, The Sims 2: Family Fun Stuff, The Sims 2: Glamour Life Stuff, The Sims 2: Happy Holiday Stuff, The Sims 2: Celebration! Stuff, The Sims 2: H&M Fashion Stuff, The Sims 2: Teen Style Stuff, The Sims 2: Kitchen & Bath Interior Design Stuff and The Sims 2: Mansion & Garden Stuff, along with The Sims 4: Grunge Revival Kit.

The Sims 2: Legacy Collection is rolling out globally on Windows 10 and 11 beginning on January 31, 2025 on the EA App, Steam, and Epic Games Store: https://ea.com/games/the-sims/the-sims-2-25th-anniv-edition/

#thesims25 #thesims #thesims2
